com.aeonphyxius.gamecomponents.manager

Class SquadronManager

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.aeonphyxius.gamecomponents.manager.SquadronManager

  • public class SquadronManager
extends Object
    SquadronManager Object.

    Squadrons Manager component to control all weapons (player and enemies)

    This class contains logic to display and fire the weapons

    Version:
    1.0
    Author:
    Alejandro Santiago
